0 cost (Baby Back Ribs/Liquid Smoke/Apple Cider Vinegar/Barbecue Sauce Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 47 Minutes

Put trivet in instant pot
Add 1½ cups Water 3 Tbsp Liquid Smoke ⅓ cup Apple Cider Vinegar into instant pot
Remove silver skin from ribs
Rub dry rub all over 1½ pounds Baby Back Ribs
Put Baby Back Ribs meat side facing outer edge of instant pot
Async 34.5 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 25 minutes, (Preheat takes 9.5 min)
Async 10 minutes Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve
     |- Preheat oven to broil on 400 degrees
Release instant pot pressure
Rub 1 cup Barbecue Sauce over Baby Back Ribs
Timer 2 minutes Broil ribs
